title: Saint Croix Island International Historic Site: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do          Outdoor Activities Walk the interpretive trail, enjoy a picnic, join a ranger-led program, bird watch, or just sit back and enjoy the scenery. Click here for more information on bird-watching.         Guided Tours Mid-May through Columbus Day a bilingual (French-English) park ranger is available most days. Visit Operating Hours & Seasons for visitor center hours and the Schedule of Events for program descriptions and times.        Park ranger presenting a program on the beach. NPS  Schedule of Events Ranger-led program schedule is listed here.         Sunrise on Cadillac Mountain, Acadia National Park. NPS  Nearby Attractions Information about other parks and sites of interest in the area.
